properties.script:
import json
import sys

# Format for JSON value
json_value = json.dumps(sys.argv[1])
# Trim first and last characters
trimmed_json_value = json_value[1:-1]

variables_to_update.variable_value_new:

encoded_project = quote(sys.argv[1])
